body_html:
Yes, it works fine for me under virtualenv, but when I follow your tutorial to retrain the inception, i can not run bazel build tensorflow/examples/image_retraining:retrain, this command need to install TF from source code, right? I know that I can just run the retrain.py script like python retrain.py, but sometimes I think it is more flexible to run it with bazel(from source code).

So all your tutorial with bazel command, we can just use python command to follow???

If I misunderstood it, please correct me:)
Thanks

body:
Yes, it works fine for me under virtualenv, but when I follow your tutorial to retrain the inception, i can not run bazel build tensorflow/examples/image_retraining:retrain, this command need to install TF from source code, right? I know that I can just run the retrain.py script like python retrain.py, but sometimes I think it is more flexible to run it with bazel(from source code).

So all your tutorial with bazel command, we can just use python command to follow???

If I misunderstood it, please correct me:)
Thanks
